entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Aupaluk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Aupaluk Airport 03:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
Temperature: -32.5°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -36.0°C
Wind: W 34 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 36. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 33.
